location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Assistant in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter concerns changes to the establishment of the Bushire Residency. It states that expenses dating from 10 July 1812 onwards are to be charged to the Bombay Government and not, as was previously the case, to the Supreme Government.
